subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Need common abbreviation list
msgSnippet: ... Thanks for the file. You should see the change in the news. I ll try to see if I can use BBC, but it might take me a bit to get to it. The problem will be
messageBody:
Moira O'Brien wrote:

> I have a table of abbreviations. I will update it for you with the
> junior equivalents as my table is just a representation of the senior
> forms per QM.
>
> You are doing great work on the news - I would love to see the BBC news
> feed
> converted. I noticed that you had introduced the basic abbreviations with approval. This will make it all the more readable.
>
>
> I also applaud your decision to stick to the QM common endings as this
> will help enormously with readability.
>

Thanks for the file. You should see the change in the news. I'll try to
see if I can use BBC, but it might take me a bit to get to it. The
problem will be trying to figure out how to work with different file
types. Remind me if I forget.

Paul
